class_notes:
DABSN Semester 3, Session Two: March 8 - May 2, 2021.


Online with synchronous sessions - Zoom.
course_description: This course is designed to integrate the clinical nursing, pathophysiology, and pharmacology content from previous classes addressing situations involving multi-system and complex health challenges. The focus of this course is on the nursing management of acutely ill and injured client.
sections: Class Nbr: 3208, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: T 12-3p, Instructor: W. Csaky, Status: Open
